physicalTable.name: SAMP_QUOTAS_F
physicalTable.description: Quotas Fact table: Stores the fact information at channel, month and product grain.

physicalColumns.name: MTH_KEY
physicalColumns.description: Month Key: Joins to Mth_Key of Time dimension table (Mth grain).

physicalColumns.name: CHNL_KEY
physicalColumns.description: Channel Key: Joins to Channel_Key of Channels dimension table.

physicalColumns.name: VALUE
physicalColumns.description: Value: Stores Quotas value as an integer

physicalColumns.name: PROD_KEY
physicalColumns.description: Product Key: Joins to Prod_Key of Products dimension table.
